_comment: Sample GloBI dataset descriptor. See http://github.com/globalbioticinteractions for more information.
citation: Shan Kothari, Pers. Comm. 2014. Dataset extracted by Shan Kothari from: Mark S. Hafner, Philip D. Sudman, Francis X. Villablanca, Theresa A. Spradling, James W. Demastes, Steven A. Nadler. (1994). Disparate Rates of Molecular Evolution in Cospeciating Hosts and Parasites. Science 265: 1087-1090.
